languages.text: "Не всех. По традиции Лорд-капитана кремируют, чтобы никто не смог использовать образцы тканей или крови для доступа к системам корабля, требующих генетического отпечатка Вольного Торговца. Желание быть обращенной в камень было когда-то высказано Леди Теодорой".

"Not all, no. Tradition demands that the Lord Captain's body be burned so that no one could use samples of their tissue or blood to gain access to the ship's systems that require the Rogue Trader's genetic imprint. Lady Theodora herself once voiced her desire to be turned into a stone."
languages.original_text: "Не всех. По традиции Лорд-капитана кремируют, чтобы никто не смог использовать образцы тканей или крови для доступа к системам корабля, требующих генетического отпечатка Вольного Торговца. Желание быть обращенной в камень было когда-то высказано Леди Теодорой".

traits.locale_text: "Not all, no. Tradition demands that the Lord Captain's body be burned so that no one could use samples of their tissue or blood to gain access to the ship's systems that require the Rogue Trader's genetic imprint. Lady Theodora herself once voiced her desire to be turned into a stone."

"Not all, no. Tradition demands that the Lord Captain's body be burned so that no one could use samples of their tissue or blood to gain access to the ship's systems that require the Rogue Trader's genetic imprint. Lady Theodora herself once voiced her desire to be turned into a stone."

"Not all, no. Tradition demands that the Lord Captain's body be burned so that no one could use samples of their tissue or blood to gain access to the ship's systems that require the Rogue Trader's genetic imprint. Lady Theodora herself once voiced her desire to be turned into a stone."

languages.text: « Pas tous, non. Traditionnellement, le corps d'un seigneur-capitaine est incinéré afin que nul ne puisse se servir d'un échantillon de tissu ou de sang pour accéder aux systèmes du vaisseau qui, comme vous le savez, requièrent l'empreinte génétique du libre-marchand. C'est dame Théodora elle-même qui a un jour émis le souhait d'être transformée en pierre. »
languages.original_text: "Not all, no. Tradition demands that the Lord Captain's body be burned so that no one could use samples of their tissue or blood to gain access to the ship's systems that require the Rogue Trader's genetic imprint. Lady Theodora herself once voiced her desire to be turned into a stone."

traits.locale_text: « Pas tous, non. Traditionnellement, le corps d'un seigneur-capitaine est incinéré afin que nul ne puisse se servir d'un échantillon de tissu ou de sang pour accéder aux systèmes du vaisseau qui, comme vous le savez, requièrent l'empreinte génétique du libre-marchand. C'est dame Théodora elle-même qui a un jour émis le souhait d'être transformée en pierre. »

languages.text: «No todos, no. La tradición exige que el cuerpo de todo Lord Capitán se incinere para que nadie pueda usar muestras de su tejido o sangre para acceder a los sistemas de la nave que requieren los genes del Comerciante Independiente. Fue la propia lady Theodora quien expresó su deseo de convertirse en gema».
languages.original_text: "Not all, no. Tradition demands that the Lord Captain's body be burned so that no one could use samples of their tissue or blood to gain access to the ship's systems that require the Rogue Trader's genetic imprint. Lady Theodora herself once voiced her desire to be turned into a stone."

traits.locale_text: «No todos, no. La tradición exige que el cuerpo de todo Lord Capitán se incinere para que nadie pueda usar muestras de su tejido o sangre para acceder a los sistemas de la nave que requieren los genes del Comerciante Independiente. Fue la propia lady Theodora quien expresó su deseo de convertirse en gema».

languages.text: “不，并非如此。按照传统，领主舰长的遗体必须焚毁，这样就没人能得到领主舰长的基因信息，也就无法入侵需要身体组织或血液样本才能访问的系统。西奥多拉夫人生前曾提过一次，说想要变成石头。”
languages.original_text: "Not all, no. Tradition demands that the Lord Captain's body be burned so that no one could use samples of their tissue or blood to gain access to the ship's systems that require the Rogue Trader's genetic imprint. Lady Theodora herself once voiced her desire to be turned into a stone."

traits.locale_text: “不，并非如此。按照传统，领主舰长的遗体必须焚毁，这样就没人能得到领主舰长的基因信息，也就无法入侵需要身体组织或血液样本才能访问的系统。西奥多拉夫人生前曾提过一次，说想要变成石头。”

languages.text: 「いいえ、全く。伝統では、ロード・キャプテンの遺体を焼くことが要求されています。身体の組織や血を使って船のシステムに入り込まないように、ご遺体は燃やすのです。シオドーラ様自身も 石になりたいと望んでいました」
languages.original_text: "Not all, no. Tradition demands that the Lord Captain's body be burned so that no one could use samples of their tissue or blood to gain access to the ship's systems that require the Rogue Trader's genetic imprint. Lady Theodora herself once voiced her desire to be turned into a stone."

traits.locale_text: 「いいえ、全く。伝統では、ロード・キャプテンの遺体を焼くことが要求されています。身体の組織や血を使って船のシステムに入り込まないように、ご遺体は燃やすのです。シオドーラ様自身も 石になりたいと望んでいました」

languages.text: "Ganz und gar nicht, nein. Die Tradition gebietet, dass der Leichnam des Lord Captains verbrannt wird, auf dass niemand Gewebe- oder Blutproben nutzen kann, um sich Zugang zu den Schiffssystemen zu verschaffen, für welche der genetische Abdruck des Freihändlers erforderlich ist. Lady Theodora selbst hat einmal den Wunsch geäußert, in einen Stein verwandelt zu werden."
languages.original_text: "Not all, no. Tradition demands that the Lord Captain's body be burned so that no one could use samples of their tissue or blood to gain access to the ship's systems that require the Rogue Trader's genetic imprint. Lady Theodora herself once voiced her desire to be turned into a stone."

Lady Theodora selbst hat einmal den Wunsch geäußert, in einen Stein verwandelt zu werden."

languages.text: "Tümünün değil, hayır. Gelenekler, Lord Kaptan'ın bedeninin yakılmasını talep eder, böylece kimse onun dokusundan veya kanından örnek alarak geminin Hür Tacir'in genetik imzasını gerektiren sistemlerine erişemez. Taşa dönüştürülme arzusunu Leydi Theodora kendisi dile getirmişti."
languages.original_text: "Not all, no. Tradition demands that the Lord Captain's body be burned so that no one could use samples of their tissue or blood to gain access to the ship's systems that require the Rogue Trader's genetic imprint. Lady Theodora herself once voiced her desire to be turned into a stone."
